## Subscribe type

Subscribes to an event stream.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Subscribe<T> = (next?: NextFn<T> | StorageObserver<T>, error?: ErrorFn, complete?: CompleteFn) => Unsubscribe;
```
